DataObject.queryStr: select GUID, UserGUID, empNumber, empName, deptName, titleName, functionName, AssessmentPlanGUID, AssessmentManagerGUID, Stage, Status, AssessUserGUID, AssessUserId, AssessUserName, StartDate, CompleteDate, AssessmentDays ,IS_DISPLAY, IS_LOCK, DATA_STATUS, D_INSERTUSER, D_INSERTTIME, D_MODIFYUSER, D_MODIFYTIME from ( select a.GUID, a.UserGUID, b.empNumber, b.empName, b.deptName, b.titleName, b.functionName, a.AssessmentPlanGUID, a.AssessmentManagerGUID, a.Stage, a.Status, a.AssessUserGUID, d.id AssessUserId, d.userName AssessUserName, a.StartDate, a.CompleteDate, a.AssessmentDays ,a.IS_DISPLAY, a.IS_LOCK, a.DATA_STATUS, a.D_INSERTUSER, a.D_INSERTTIME, a.D_MODIFYUSER, a.D_MODIFYTIME from SmpPmUserAssessmentStage a join SmpHrEmployeeInfoV b on b.empNumber = a.UserGUID join SmpPmAssessmentUserScore c on c.AssessmentManagerGUID = a.AssessmentManagerGUID join VSmpPmUser d on d.id = a.AssessUserGUID union select a.GUID, a.UserGUID, b.empNumber, b.empName, b.deptName, b.titleName, b.functionName, a.AssessmentPlanGUID, a.AssessmentManagerGUID, case when Len(a.FinalScore)=0 then 4 else 3 end Stage,a.Status,a.AssessUserGUID,c.id AssessUserId, c.userName AssessUserName,a.D_INSERTTIME,a.D_MODIFYTIME,'' AssessmentDays,a.IS_DISPLAY, a.IS_LOCK, a.DATA_STATUS, a.D_INSERTUSER, a.D_INSERTTIME, a.D_MODIFYUSER, a.D_MODIFYTIME from dbo.SmpPmUserAchievement as a join SmpHrEmployeeInfoV b on b.empNumber = a.UserGUID join VSmpPmUser c on c.id = a.AssessUserGUID union select NEWID(), a.UserGUID, b.empNumber, b.empName, b.deptName, b.titleName, b.functionName, a.AssessmentPlanGUID, a.AssessmentManagerGUID, case when Len(isNULL(a.SubmitStatus,''))=0 then 6 else 5 end Stage,case when Len(isNULL(a.SubmitStatus,''))=0 then 'UnSubmit' else 'Submit' end Status,a.AssessUserGUID,c.id AssessUserId, c.userName AssessUserName,a.D_INSERTTIME,a.D_MODIFYTIME,'' AssessmentDays,a.IS_DISPLAY, a.IS_LOCK, a.DATA_STATUS, a.D_INSERTUSER, a.D_INSERTTIME, a.D_MODIFYUSER, a.D_MODIFYTIME from dbo.SmpPmUserAchievement as a join SmpHrEmployeeInfoV b on b.empNumber = a.UserGUID join VSmpPmUser c on c.id = a.AssessUserGUID ) z

field.showName: 0:自評階段;1:一階評核;2:二階評核;4:成績分配;3:成績分配;5:提交狀態;6:提交狀態
DRAFT:未開始;OPEN:進行中;COMPLETE:已完成;CLOSE:已結案;CANCEL:取消;UnSubmit:未提交;Submit:已提交
N:正常;A:新增中;M:修改中;D:刪除中
